summary: A look at Communist musicals that strove to be ideologically correct - and entertaining, besides.
cast: Margarita Andrushkovich|Chris Doerk|Erich Gusko|Helmut Hanke|Barbara Harnisch|Brit Krüger|Andrea Schmidt|Karin Schröder|Frank Schöbel|Maya Turovskaya|Brigitte Ulbrich|Hans-Joachim Wallstein|Nikolai Bulganin|Nikita Khrushchev|Marina Ladynina|V.I. Lenin|Anastas Mikoyan|Vyacheslav Molotov|Lyubov Orlova|Dana Ranga|Joseph Stalin|Walter Ulbricht
title: East Side Story
